soba_userInput: complete the wizard with the typical configurations options
soba_metaModelContext:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ecore:EPackage xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ecore="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore" name="wizards" nsURI="http://example.com/wizards" nsPrefix="Wiz">
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Wizard">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="title" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="pages" lowerBound="1" upperBound="-1" eType="//Page" containment="true" eOpposite="//Page/wizard">
      <eAnnotations source="http://www.eclipse.org/OCL/Collection">
        <details key="nullFree" value="false"/>
      </eAnnotations>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="initialPage" lowerBound="1" eType="//Page"/>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Page">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="wizard" lowerBound="1" eType="//Wizard" eOpposite="//Wizard/pages"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="fields" upperBound="-1" eType="//Field" containment="true">
      <eAnnotations source="http://www.eclipse.org/OCL/Collection">
        <details key="nullFree" value="false"/>
      </eAnnotations>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="buttons" lowerBound="1" upperBound="-1" eType="//Button" containment="true">
      <eAnnotations source="http://www.eclipse.org/OCL/Collection">
        <details key="nullFree" value="false"/>
      </eAnnotations>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="checkbox" eType="//Checkbox" containment="true"/>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Field">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="label" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="minLength" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EInt"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="maxLength" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EInt"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="anyLength">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EBoolean"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="isPassword">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EBoolean"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Checkbox">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="checked" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EBoolean"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="label" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Button" abstract="true">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="label" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="NavigateButton" eSuperTypes="//Button">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="toPage" lowerBound="1" eType="//Page"/>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="BackButton" eSuperTypes="//Button"/>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="ShowMessageButton" eSuperTypes="//Button">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="messageText" lowerBound="1">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="CloseWizardButton" eSuperTypes="//Button"/>
</ecore:EPackage>

recommendationPayload.title: Choose and Customise the LLM requests
